text: Arau ami pratyeka sampradayara babe ‘manachaka’ra niyama bana'i dicho; yate te'om te'omlokaka jiranopakarana hicape yibora catuspada jantu pradana karaiche, se'iborara oparata te'omloke allahara nama uccarana karae. Eteke tomalokara ilaha kerala ekaka ilaha, seye kerala te'omra ocarate'i atmasamarpana karaa, arau susambada diya binitaloka sakalaka
